## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                  | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default              |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `themeColor` | `theme-color` | The theme color to be used for this spinner. | `ThemeColor.DANGER \| ThemeColor.DARK \| ThemeColor.INFO \| ThemeColor.LIGHT \| ThemeColor.PRIMARY \| ThemeColor.SECONDARY \| ThemeColor.SUCCESS \| ThemeColor.WARNING \| { xs?: ThemeColor; sm?: ThemeColor; md?: ThemeColor; lg?: ThemeColor; xl?: ThemeColor; }` | `ThemeColor.PRIMARY` |
